description:
Helicopter Landing PRO is an amazing and extremely addictive game!

The purpose of the game is to land your gas-less chopper as fast as possible.
There is a lot of wind, you will see the indicators, so use your talent to land as safe and quickly as possible.
To land the chopper just press the arrow on the left/right to align the plane with the floor.
If you don't align the helicopter properly, you will crash... Can you do it?
We included a leader board, so lets see who is the best pilot; are you up to the challenge?


keywords: helicopters,chopper,choper,fun,game,landing,land,park,fly,flying,cool,addictive,new,games,airport
